trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_TYRMARN_000_000<tab>This punishment of mine is shaping up to be rather exciting! I only thought to sate my intellectual curiosity, you see, but I ended up crossing a line. Or two. Or three...

TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_TYRMARN_000_010<tab>Bring me anything curious, anything more unnatural than usual, and I'll tell you what it truly is. I delight in all discoveries, but let us hope for something <var 1A 02 /var>spicy<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_A1_000_021<tab>Appraise a piece of the Accursed or Blessed Hoard.

TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_TYRMARN_000_030<tab>They may be ruins now, but the churches of the First Light were once abustle with parishioners and pilgrims. And where people have been, so have their belongings!

TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_TYRMARN_000_031<tab>Among the bits and bobs fallen from loose pockets must hide treasure─treasure from a sanctum's vault, perhaps! Does not the mere thought of it make your fingers itch?
TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>When exploring the deep dungeon, players will, on occasion, find pieces of the Accursed Hoard─treasure abandoned by pilgrims of eld.
TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>You can ascertain the value of pieces found in Pilgrim's Traverse by presenting them to Tyr Marn for appraisal.

TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_TYRMARN_000_040<tab>Blessings come in all sorts─in golds and riches, in jewels and glass, in the ruddy cheeks of a smiling babe... The very flow of time that brought you to this moment may in itself be providence. Even a simple stone can be a blessing to some!

TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_TYRMARN_000_041<tab>The significance of any item is bestowed by its holder, after all. And it, in turn, blesses us with knowledge of its former masters. Such very sweet knowledge, indeed... <slurp>

TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>By completing objectives in your challenge log, you may earn pieces of the Blessed Hoard. Speak with Vanthau to consult the challenge log category for Pilgrim's Traverse.
TEXT_CTSDDD4GACHA_00943_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>You can receive special items from pieces of the Blessed Hoard by presenting them to Tyr Marn for appraisal.
